title: ORSEN Kids Toys 8.5 Inch LCD Writing Tablet, Reusable Drawing Pad for Kids, Learning Doodle Board for Christmas Birthday Gift for Girls, Travel Toys for 3-8 Year Old Boys Girls Toddler (Pink)
features: 【AWESOME TOYS GIFTS FOR KIDS】Orsen 8.5 Inch Doodle Tablet are a perfect gift choice for 3 4 5 6 7 8 years old girls boys for Birthdays, Christmas, Children's Day, Halloween and any occasion. Ideal for all age group kids. Kids drawing board can be an educational toys for preschoolers. It can be a travel toys for long drives and road trips.The children to explore their creativity anytime and anywhere

【Mess-Free Fun for Tiny Handsp】Let your child explore art safely with our non-toxic magnetic drawing board! The drawing tablet for kids uses pressure-sensitive technology, it can create lines with a stylus or any hard object. Click the erase button of the drawing board to clear the screen content in one second, achieve time and energy saving. The key lock effectively prevents accidental clearing, and the screen can be erased when the writing pad unlocking.

【On-The-Go Creativity】ORSEN drawing pad for kids is Made of high-quality plastic material, Lightweight and shatterproof LCD screen fits in backpacks! Perfect for school, travel, restaurants, outdoor, vacations, or doctor visits. Slim 8.5 Inch screen with anti-scratch coating, is waterproof and anti-fall ensures long-lasting use

【Save Paper, Save Money】Replace endless paper stacks with our reusable doodle board! No ink needed — 3 easy steps operation for all age toddlers: Draw→Erase→Draw. Budget-friendly pick for parents and eco-conscious families, replace 100,000 sheets of paper, parents save £50+/year on art supplies

【No More Lost Pens】Writing tablet kids pen holder and pen cable dual design, children no longer have to search for pens everywhere. Keep your child drwaing in the classroom, camping, restaurant, plane and car. The best partner for growth and creativity with children, perfect travel toys for toddlers on plane
